text: Carme Contreras i Verdiales (4 October 1932 â€“ 6 July 2020) was a Spanish actress. She was known for dubbing the voice E.T. in E.T. the Extra- Terrestrial, mother Fratelli in The Goonies and Marge Simpson in The Simpsons in their Catalan versions. On television, her best known role was in El Cor de la Ciutat. Contreras i Verdiales died on 6 July 2020, aged 87. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:Spanish stage actors
title: Carme Contreras i Verdiales
